partInfo.name: Stem
partInfo.bio: This part is the component on a bicycle that connects the handlebars to the steerer tube of the bicycle fork. Changing this component can change your reach and your drop.

partInfo.name: Crank
partInfo.bio: This part is the component on a bicycle that is connected to the pedal and is what you turn when you pedal. Changing the crank can change your seat height

partInfo.name: Handlebar
partInfo.bio: This part is the component on a bicycle that you push and pull to turn the bike. Changing this part can effect your reach and your drop.
